text: Yeh sadaqaat to dar-asal fakeeron aur miskeeno ke liye hain aur un logon ke liye jo sadaqaat ke kaam par mamoor hon, aur unke liye jinki taalif-e-qalb (whose hearts are to be won over) matloob ho neiz yeh gardano ke chudane(ransoming of slaves) aur qarzdaron ki madad karne mein aur raah e khuda mein aur musafir-nawazi mein istemal karne ke liye hain. Ek fareeza hai Allah ki taraf se aur Allah sab kuch jaanne wala aur dana o beena hai
